text: "More, More, More" is a pop single by Andrea True Connection. The song was sampled for Len's 1999 "Steal My Sunshine". The song was covered by other artists, including Samantha Fox, Bananarama and Rachel Stevens. This song hit #4 on the Billboard Hot 100. It was released in February 1976. Category:1976 songs Category:2004 songs Category:Pop songs Category:Bananarama songs
title: More, More, More
